short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SnooIt lets you set timed reminders for web pages, helping you manage your browsing efficiently.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SnooIt lets you "snooze" web pages for later, helping you balance immediate tasks with future interests. It's your personal tab manager, ensuring you never lose track of valuable online content while staying focused on current tasks.

✨ Key Features

🕒 Quick preset reminders
⏱️ Custom time input for flexible scheduling
📋 Visual reminder list
🖱️ One-click reminder creation
🔔 Notification system for timely alerts

💡 SnooIt is perfect for:

 📚 Students doing research
📊 Professionals managing multiple projects
🛒 Online shoppers comparing products
⚙️ Anyone who wants to optimize their browsing experience

Version 1.1.0 [2024.07.30]:
- feat: add custom message
- feat: add new presets
- feat: group reminders with same URL
- fix: replace sync storage by local storage for more capacity
- fix: sort items properly
- fix: general bugfixes and improvements

SnooIt - Never forget important content again!
